org.openimaj.image.indexing.vlad

Class VLADIndexerData

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.indexing.vlad.VLADIndexerData

  • public class VLADIndexerData
extends Object
    Class representing the data required to build a VLAD + PCA + product-quantisation based image index.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

        Construct with the given data
        Parameters:
        vlad - the VLAD extractor
        pca - the PCA basis
        pq - the product quantiser
        extractor - the raw local feature extractor
        postProcess - the process to apply to the raw features before VLAD aggregation

    • Method Detail

      • extractPcaVlad

        public float[] extractPcaVlad(List<? extends org.openimaj.feature.local.LocalFeature<?,?>> features)
        Extract the PCA-projected VLAD feature from the given raw local features. The local features will be post-processed before being aggregated using VLAD and projected by the PCA basis.
        Parameters:
        features - the raw local features
        Returns:
        the pca-vlad aggregated representation of the image

      • extractPcaVlad

        public float[] extractPcaVlad(org.openimaj.image.MBFImage image)
        Extract the PCA-projected VLAD feature from the given image. The local features will be post-processed before being aggregated using VLAD and projected by the PCA basis.
        Parameters:
        image - the image to extract from
        Returns:
        the pca-vlad aggregated representation of the image

      • extractPQPcaVlad

        public byte[] extractPQPcaVlad(List<? extends org.openimaj.feature.local.LocalFeature<?,?>> features)
        Extract the product-quantised PCA-projected VLAD feature from the given raw local features. The local features will be post-processed before being aggregated using VLAD and projected by the PCA basis.
        Parameters:
        features - the raw local features
        Returns:
        the product-quantised pca-vlad aggregated representation of the image

        Returns:

        public int index(List<? extends org.openimaj.feature.local.LocalFeature<?,?>> features,
        org.openimaj.knn.pq.IncrementalFloatADCNearestNeighbours nn)

        nn - the nearest neighbours object
        Returns:
        the index at which the features were added in the nearest neighbours object
